attributes.action: Children In Primary Schools Shouldn’t Be Taught LGBTQ+ Or Any Sort Of Sex Ed
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to allow us to remove our children from these lessons for religious and cultural reasons. I don’t feel it’s appropriate for little children to learn about sex and the LGBTQ+. There’s no rush these children are innocent and they do not understand anything and when taught something like that it will cause them to confusion and trauma please don’t force us to remove our children completely from the schools.
attributes.background: We want the government to give us parents the option to remove our children in primary schools from lessons that teach about sex and the LGBQ+.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332952

There is no content on sexual education in the primary curriculum, and parents already have the right to remove their children from lessons on subject material that is not in the national curriculum.
